text: Silvanus Griffiths, D.D. was an Anglican priest in the 17th century."Hereford Cathedral" Aylmer, G p248: London; Hambledon Press; 2000 Griffiths was born in Herefordshire and educated at Brasenose College, Oxford.Alumni Oxonienses 1500-1714, Greenhill-Gysby He held livings at Kingsland, Hampton Bishop and Hopesay. Griffiths became Treasurer of Hereford Cathedral in 1604; Archdeacon of Hereford in 1606; and Dean of Hereford in 1617.Fasti ecclesiae Anglicanae Vol.1 p520 ==References== Category:Deans of Hereford Category:Archdeacons of Hereford Category:17th-century English clergy Category:Alumni of Brasenose College, Oxford Category:People from Herefordshire
title: Silvanus Griffiths
